name: Car Parkour - 3D Offroad Crazy
description:
Master the art of driving through Crazy Car Parkour - 3D Extreme Offroad, the latest and most realistic car driving simulator game.
Grab the wheel, buckle up, and experience what driving a real car feels like. You will unlock new vehicles and steering wheels as you progress through the game. Take your skills to the next level by navigating your way around challenging environments, from smooth city streets to rough terrain such as mountain roads or desert landscapes.
FEATURES:
- Over 200 levels to play with numerous virtual environments
- 3 different camera car views
- A variety of vehicles to pick like sport cars, SUVs, sedans, Supercars, hatchbacks, trucks, Jeeps and more
- Real engine sounds and high quality 3D graphics
- Easy and intuitive, one-finger control
HOW TO PLAY:
- Hold to drive, release to brake
- Put your car into D to go forward and R to go backwards
- Be safe, be responsible
Having ultimate fun cruising around in your favorite vehicles while advancing your driving skills – for free! Wait no more, download Crazy Car Parkour - 3D Extreme Offroad and start driving today!
